      static void alertAdminAboutMessageError(Message aMessage, boolean isRetryableError)

      static String reportRetryableError(Message aMessage, ErrorCategory errorCategory)

      static String reportRetryableErrorNoRetry(Message aMessage, ErrorCategory errorCategory)
      This function takes a message and reports it as retryable but does not attempt to retry it. It is provided for educationl purposes only.
